Summary: Three Brilliant blue flashes of light over the city of Bellflower, CA that made the city look like mid-day at 0200hrs on 22 June 2012
trends: There has been one other sighting in Bellflower
There were no other sightings in Bellflower on or around June 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile laying in bed @ approximately 0200hrs in Bellflower, CA on 22 June 2012 With the curtains pulled back. I noticed three bright flashes within five minutes. These night flashes lasted approximately 5-7 seconds each. During the second flash,I woke my girlfriend who was sleeping next to me and she to observed the brilliant blue light in the sky. After the third bright flash I stared getting tweets from my friends in the Bellflower, CA neighborhood who were up and in awe at the night sky. I looked in the Press Telegram the following day and did not see anything about a meteor or a downed powerline in the area. I also don't believe a downed powerline would light up the city of Bellflower.
